positioningProps.name: position
positioningProps.desc: Changes how the component is positioned relative to its parent

positioningProps.name: left
positioningProps.desc: The number of units (usually in pixels) which specifies the horizontal position of the component, starting from the left

positioningProps.name: right
positioningProps.desc: The number of units (usually in pixels) which specifies the horizontal position of the component, starting from the right

positioningProps.name: top
positioningProps.desc: The number of units (usually in pixels) which specifies the vertical position of the component, starting from the top

positioningProps.name: bottom
positioningProps.desc: The number of units (usually in pixels) which specifies the vertical position of the component, starting from the bottom

positioningProps.name: margin
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the margin for the component

positioningProps.name: marginTop
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the top margin for the component

positioningProps.name: marginRight
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the right margin for the component

positioningProps.name: marginLeft
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the left margin for the component

positioningProps.name: marginBottom
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the bottom margin for the component

positioningProps.name: alignSelf
positioningProps.desc: Defines the positioning of a component relative to its container

positioningProps.name: alignItems
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the default alignment for items inside the component

positioningProps.name: rotate
positioningProps.desc: A number defining the amount in degrees that the component will be rotated

positioningProps.name: flexSize
positioningProps.desc: Shorthand Property for defining the flex. See Examples here: https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/flexbox-the-ultimate-css-flex-cheatsheet/

positioningProps.name: flexGrow
positioningProps.desc: Defines how much a component will grow relative to other components in the container

positioningProps.name: flexShrink
positioningProps.desc: Defines how much a component will shrink relative to other components in the container

positioningProps.name: flexBasis
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the initial length of a flexible component

positioningProps.name: flexWrap
positioningProps.desc: Defines the style value for the flex-wrap style

positioningProps.name: flexDirection
positioningProps.desc: Defines the style value for the flex-wrap style

positioningProps.name: paddingSize
positioningProps.desc: Padding to be applied to the element

positioningProps.name: paddingTop
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the top padding for the component

positioningProps.name: paddingRight
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the right padding for the component

positioningProps.name: paddingLeft
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the left padding for the component

positioningProps.name: paddingBottom
positioningProps.desc: Specifies the bottom padding for the component

positioningProps.name: translate
positioningProps.desc: Allows you to change the position of an element.
